name: Ragnarok (NamelessGod95)
description: Being the hero all the time is boring. In Ragnarok, you, a cultist, are defending a summoning ritual from waves of heroes. Harvest the souls from these heroes and use them to both upgrade your character and get new abilities. Confront yourself and embrace your corruption to gain the power to summon a forgotten beast, gifting you the power to destroy the world.
